question: From which country India took over the chairmanship of the Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) for the 2019-2021 term?
explanation: The Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) is the largest association of Election Management Bodies (EMBs) worldwide. A-WEB was established on October 14, 2013, in Song-do, South Korea. The permanent secretariat of A-WEB is located in Seoul, South Korea. A-WEB’s vision is to foster efficiency and effectiveness in conducting free, fair, transparent and participative elections worldwide. At the 4th General Assembly of Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) held at Bengaluru, Karnataka on 3rd September 2019, India took over as A-WEB’s Chair for the 2019-21 term from Romania.
